name: Anse Volbert: Tide Ledger
description:
Low tide reveals 7 traps, 1 anchor, 2 staffs.

Riddle: "When the ocean writes, it uses sticks and stars."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Low tide reveals 7 traps, 1 anchor, 2 staffs.. low_tide_exposed_secrets with wet_sand_reflective_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_receding_water_midground_traps_foreground_anchor. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: traditional_fish_traps, ceremonial_staffs. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: Low tide reveals 7 traps, 1 anchor, 2 staffs.
puzzle_data.riddle: When the ocean writes, it uses sticks and stars.

props.description: Traditional fish traps revealed by tide
